TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Bngwan, title = Bngwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bngwan} }

S.FORM: Bngwan Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Bngwan a niyaro', 5 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 22 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 86% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 14% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 77%, Amis 9%.

Bngwan Itiniay i Datong Cen no Yilan ko Bngwan a niyaro', 5 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 22 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 86% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 19 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 14% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 77%, Amis 9%.
